title: Strengthening CS Competencies in Practical Skills: Instructor Development for Enhancing Online Learning Accessibility and Inclusivity

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online education management experience and understanding of accessibility principles
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Participants can identify and explain three or more core web accessibility guidelines from WCAG 2.1 standards
Using an inclusive content design framework that considers diverse learner needs, participants can improve one or more educational modules
Participants can propose two or more practical strategies (e.g., establishing quality standards, persuading leadership) to promote accessibility culture within institutions
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
